column1: Historic Data For Mississippi River at Lock and Dam 22 (Saverton,MO)

column2: River Mile: 301.2 miles above the mouth of the Ohio River

column1: Pool No. 22 extends from river mile 301.2 upstream to Quincy, IL. Lock and Dam 22 is located off of Highway 79 on Route E. It is directly upstream from Cottel Island near Saverton, MO.
